## Tenders Announcement
### Floor Mounted Payout Machine
#### Eligibility

* This tender is open to all suppliers capable of producing and delivering a floor mounted payout machine capable of handling large diameter wire and cable, with a three-roll shaftless design.

#### Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3922450838
* Solicitation Title: Floor Mounted Payout Machine
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

#### Tender Requirements
* Event Date: *Publication Date: May 15, 2023*
* Closing Date and Time: July 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Estimated Start Date of Contract: February 28, 2024

#### Trade Agreements
* Eligible bidders must indicate which one or more of the following trade agreements they wish to rely on in their bid:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Government of Canada Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Notice URL
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16275379?extsite=MTYyNzUzNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16275379?extsite=MTYyNzUzNzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information
* Name: Matthew Furlong (SPAC/PSPC)
* E-mail: [matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
